name: Star Bridge
description:
As an Captain of an elite fleet of ships, your mission is to explore the unknown warp hole that has appeared suddenly within Earth's orbital system. 

===========================================================

This is a tech demo which was created and developed for GameDevHq to showcase my ability to work with Unity Timeline and Cinemachine. I am was able to demonstrate how to effectively apply my knowledge  about Timeline and Animation Triggers within a real world game settings.
